title: Cajun chicken bits in tempura batter
ingredients: ['For the chicken', '4 tablespoons Cajun seasoning', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '8 chicken breast fillets, cut into bite size strips', 'oil for frying', 'For the batter', '150g cornflour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '100ml cold water']
